sentences.en: A new format would alienate its ageing readership without attracting young readers.
sentences.cn: 新的版式会疏远上了年纪的读者群，并且也不会吸引年轻读者。

sentences.en: Beautifully designed and bound periodicals can help attract the readership.
sentences.cn: 优良的装帧设计有助于提高期刊的质量,增强期刊吸引力.

sentences.en: Chinese newspapers have a large readership around the world.
sentences.cn: 中文报纸在全世界拥有众多的读者.

sentences.en: It reflects the readership the authors had in mind.
sentences.cn: 它反映出作者心中的读者定位.

sentences.en: Its readership has grown to over 15,000 subscribers.
sentences.cn: 它的订阅人数上升到了15,000多人。

sentences.en: Len Deighton has / commands a large readership.
Lianhe Zaobao today has a readership of over 800,000.
sentences.cn: 《联合早报》目前的读者群已超过80万人.

sentences.en: Modern Mold & Die has a readership over 100, 000.
sentences.cn: 现代 模具 》拥有固定读者约10万人.

sentences.en: Publishers are more worried about the loss of advertising revenue than readership.
sentences.cn: 出版商更担心的是广告收入——而非读者群——的流失.

sentences.en: The Daily Echo has a readership of over ten million.
sentences.cn: 《每日回声报》拥有读者逾一千万人.

sentences.en: The magazine has got a large readership.
They are hoping that the paper will have quite a wide readership .
sentences.cn: 他们希望这份报纸会有很多读者。

sentences.en: Welcome various forestry branch, wide readership to be recommended actively, contribute.
sentences.cn: 欢迎各级林业部门 、 广大读者积极推荐 、 投稿.

sentences.en: What can editors and publishers do to arrest the readership slide?
sentences.cn: 怎麽编辑和出版者都逮捕读者滑坡?

sentences.en: What's the target readership of this paper?
sentences.cn: 这份报纸以哪些人为读者对象?

sentences.en: Your Readership No. will be emailed to you upon receipt of payment.
sentences.cn: 当您付款后,我们将会以电邮通知您的读者编号,来函时请注明编号.

words.tran_cn: 可读的；易读的；读起来津津有味的

trans.tran_cn: （报纸杂志拥有者的）读者（数），读者，准教授职位
trans.tran_en: all the people who read a particular newspaper or magazine regularly
